ticket.title: Atom feed helper needs to accept a language option for entries
ticket.original-body:
In Atom, the <entry> element may have an xml:lang attribute, which describes the language of that specific entry. This is different from the language option for the whole feed in that it enables multilingual feeds.
This patch simply adds this option to the entry method, using the same style as for the language option on atom_feed. The default is to not add any attribute (which is the same behaviour that is currently in place). It includes a test and documentation.
